Draft Rating:

C-

Neil Olshey ranks in the 46th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Olshey's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 3 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Damian Lillard with 6th pick but was worth 2th pick.
  • Drafted CJ McCollum with 10th pick but was worth 3th pick.
  • Drafted Will Barton with 40th pick but was worth 35th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Al-Farouq Aminu with 8th pick but was worth 42th pick.
  • Drafted Meyers Leonard with 11th pick but was worth 43th pick.
  • Drafted Anfernee Simons with 24th pick but was worth 51th pick.

Trade Rating:

D

Neil Olshey ranks in the 31th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Chris Paul, Artūras Gudaitis to LAC.
  • Lost Al-Farouq Aminu, Eric Gordon, Chris Kaman, Austin Rivers to NOH.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Jamario Moon, Mo Williams to LAC.
  • Lost Baron Davis, Kyrie Irving to CLE.

Signing Rating:

C

Neil Olshey ranks in the 48th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database. That's basically average. It could be worse though lol.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Jusuf Nurkić in 2018.
  • Signed CJ McCollum in 2019.
  • Signed Dorell Wright in 2013.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Evan Turner in 2016.
  • Signed Zach Collins in 2017.
  • Signed Ryan Gomes in 2010.
